column2: "Na muhun ɔbɔfo fofor hoɔdzenfo a ofi sor risian no
column3: na ɔahyɛ nsuwusiw; nyankontɔn wɔ ne tsir do

column2: "na okitsa nwoma kakraba bi a woebue mu: na ɔdze ne nan nyimfa sii po do
column3: na ɔdze bankum no sii asaase do;"

column2: "na ɔdze ndze kɛse tseaa mu dɛ gyata ropɔw; na ɔtseaa mu no
column3: asenaman esuon no bɔɔ hɔn ndze mu."
nkyɛ mereyɛ makyerɛw: na metsee ndze bi fi sor see me dɛ
column4: Sɔw dza asenaman esuon no kae no ano

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no a muhun dɛ ogyina po nye asaase do no
column3: maa ne nsa do kyerɛɛ sor
column5: "na ɔkaa nyia ɔtse ase mbersantsen mfesantsen a ɔbɔɔ sor nye dza ɔwɔ mu
column6: nye asaase nye dza ɔwɔ mu
column7: nye po nye dza ɔwɔ mu ho ntam dɛ

column2: "mbom ber a ɔbɔfo a otsia esuon no bɛhɛn no totorobɛnto no
column3: nna Nyankopɔn bɛhyɛ n’esumasɛm nhyehyɛɛ no ma
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔpaa mu kaa kyerɛɛ no nkowaa nkɔnhyɛfo no."

column2: "Na ndze a metsee fii sor no nye me kasaa bio dɛ
column4: kɛgye nwoma kakraba a woebue mu no wɔ ɔbɔfo a ogyina po nye asaase do no ne nsamu."

column2: "Na mokɔr ɔbɔfo no hɔ kɛsee no dɛ ɔmfa nwoma kakraba no mma me. Na ɔsee me dɛ
column4: na men; na ɔbɛyɛ wenwen wɔ wo yamu
column5: na w’anomu dze ɔbɛyɛ fenemfenem dɛ ewo."

column2: "Na megyee nwoma kakraba no wɔ ɔbɔfo no nsamu
column3: na memenee; na ɔyɛɛ fenemfenem wɔ m’anomu dɛ ewo
Otwar dɛ ehyɛ nkɔm bio wɔ nkorɔfo
